original_text: He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.
korean_text: 그가 철 병기를 피할 때에는 놋화살을 쏘아 꿰뚫을 것이요

sentences.original_text: He shall flee from the iron weapon
and the bow of steel shall strike him through
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 강철 활이 그를 꿰뚫을 것이다
